content.rendered:
Wonders of Kumaon Tour Package

Home » India » Utarakhand » Wonders of Kumaon Tour Package

Tour Overview

Nestled comfortably on the lap of the sacred Nanda Devi range, the entire Kumaon is one of the most blissful and enchanting destinations in India. Namaste India trip presents you with an opportunity to explore some of the awe-inspiring wonders of Kumaon with an 8 days and 7 nights of wonders of Kumaon tour package where you will be taken across some of the most enthralling locations in this hilly region.

Wonders of Kumaon Tour Itinerary Package

Day 1 :Arrival in Delhi – Corbett

You will be welcomed in Delhi where our tour representative will transfer you to Corbett after covering a 7 hours of road journey. You will then be taken to your allotted hotel where you will be checked in for the night. Later you will also be made to visit Garjiya Devi mandir after which you will return back to your hotel.

Day 2 :Corbett Sightseeing

You will be taken on a thrilling morning time jeep safari of this beautiful national park which is home to numerous species of flora and fauna. After having a fun day out in the wild, the evening time will be free for your leisure activities.

Things to keep in mind while at a national park:

  • Do not bring anything that will turn to waste, especially plastic materials.
  • Do not be loud, which will diminish your chances of sighting any animals.
  • Alcohol consumption within the park premises or entering the park while inebriated in not allowed under any circumstances.

Day 3 :Corbett – Ranikhet

Early in the morning after breakfast, you will be transferred to the queen’s land of Ranikhet. After covering a distance of 6 hours and getting checked in to your allotted hotel. The evening time will be free for you to explore the gorgeous hamlet on foot. You will be staying overnight at your hotel.

Day 4 :Ranikhet – Kausani

Post breakfast you will be taken on a half day of sightseeing expedition of Ranikhet which will include mesmerizing sites of Chaubatia – a cantonment hill station filled with natural scenic beauty; jhoola devi mandir – dedicated to goddess Jhula devi and featuring innumerable temple bells; ram mandir – which is located near Jhula Devi Temple and one of the most popular Hindu temples in Ranikhet.

You will then commence your journey towards one of the most pristine hill stations of northern India of Kausani. This hamlet sitting on the lap of the mighty Himalayan ranges is also one of the best honeymoon destinations in India.

You will immediately be checked in to your allotted hotel here for the night.

Day 5 :Kausani – Baijnath – Kausani

After witnessing the glorious sunrise over the snow peaked Himalayan Mountain range you will be returned to your hotel for breakfast after which you will be made to visit the famous Baijnath temple – an ancient temple dedicated to the Hindu goddess Parvati (Lord Shiva’s consort). After paying your respects to the goddess you will be driven back to Kausani for staying the night.

Day 6 :Kausani – Nainital

You will be leaving for Nainital after finishing your breakfast. This journey will be of 3 hours and 40 mines by road, where upon arrival and after getting checked in to your allotted hotel here, you will be free to explore this teeming and refreshing hill town on your own. You can stroll along the roads of Mall Road and buy souvenirs like, local paintings, scented candles, homemade chocolates, truffles, locally produced organic fruits and so much more. You can also choose to walk by the shimmering blue lake of Naini where you can enjoy the calming boat ride.

Day 7 :Nainital Sightseeing

The entire day today will be free for you to explore the tourist spots in Nainital which are well known all over the world. You have the option of going on a lake tour of nearby places like, Bhimtal, Sattal, Naukuchiatal in order to explore the real beauty of nature in all its vigor.

  • Nainital to Bhimtal – 50 mines.
  • Nainital to Sattal – 1 hour 30 mines.
  • Nainital to Naukuchiatal – 40 mines.

Day 8 :Nainital – Delhi (Departure)

After having your breakfast you will be made to depart for Delhi where you will be transferred to Delhi airport from where you will commence your journey onwards.

Price Details

Tour Name Wonders of Kumaon Tour Package
Duration 8 Days / 7 Nights
Destinations Delhi - Corbett - Ranikhet - Kausani
Tour Price On Request

Chat with specialist who can help plan your tour!

  • +91-971 1616 316

    Holiday Your Way with Namaste India Trip!

    Filling out the information form provided allows you to receive the best budget-friendly customized itinerary in just a few hours.

    • We assure the privacy of your contact data.

    • This data will only be used by our team to contact you and no other purposes.

    Package Inclusions

    • All car / taxi / cab service
    • Accommodation as per itinerary
    • Meals as per itinerary
    • Driver allowance, parking fees, fuel charges
    • Pick up and drop off service

    Package Exclusions

    • Medical and travel insurance
    • Any expense of personal nature
    • Monument entrance fees
    • Tipping, phone bills, etc.
    • Anything not mentioned in the inclusions section

      We never share your Information.
